'''Carmet''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

Carmet is one of [Gulfaryc](/gulfaryc/)'s companions, elder members of the [Steel Garrote](/steelGarrote/) who set out to find the [Magistrate's Cudgel](/magistratesCudgel/) - and found it.
